title: Moderate-speed city driving at night, with a red truck parked on the side of the road.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving straight on a city street at night, with a red truck parked on the side of the road.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.1 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is a two-lane city street with a speed limit of 30 mph. There are several other cars on the road, including a white car in the distance and a black car to the left of the ego vehicle. The traffic light ahead is red, and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is clear and visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is maintaining a moderate speed and keeping a safe distance from the other cars on the road. It is also paying attention to the pedestrian crossing the street and the red traffic light ahead. The parked red truck on the side of the road is not obstructing the ego vehicle's path, but it may require the ego vehicle to slow down or change lanes if it needs to turn right.
